ISSUE.TITLE: Chart results do not update on additional executions
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Execute a query, chart it, change the query, execute again, chart will use the old results, not the new ones.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Applied shfmt, and added a shebang to cleanup.sh $ shfmt -i 2 -l -w setup.sh data/*sh This also now passes the Restyled shellcheck test properly: $ docker run --rm -v "$PWD:/code" restyled/restyler-shellcheck:v0.9.0 shellcheck-fix -x setup.sh data/do_*sh
